General.Name: St-Georges Eco-Mining Corp
General.Description: St-Georges Eco-Mining Corp. engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in Canada and Iceland. The company primarily explores for gold, nickel, lithium, copper, cobalt, silver, magnesium, and palladium, as well as platinum group metals. It holds interests in the Julie project comprising of various claims for an area of 16,227 hectares located on the Quebec's North Shore; Manicouagan project consists of various claims covering an area of 20, 474 hectares located on the Quebec's North Shore; Notre Dame project comprising of various mining claims located in Quebec; and Le Royal Lithium Project covering an area of 286.02 hectares located in Quebec. In addition, it is developing block chain technology. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1000 Rue Sherbrooke West, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3A 3G4
